Austria.tax_benefits: VAT deduction and exemption for zero-emission cars.
purchase_incentives: Bonus for new cars and vans with fully-electric range of 50km and gross list price of ≤€60,000:

Belgium.tax_benefits: Deductibility of 100% under corporate taxation for zero-emission vehicles.
purchase_incentives: Minimum rate for zero-emission vehicles (€61.50 in Brussels and Wallonia, €76.32 + 10% municipal tax in Flanders).
Flanders: Exemptions for BEVs, PHEVs, and FCEVs emitting ≤50g CO2/km until 2020.
Newly-registered leased zero-emission vehicles are exempted.

Croatia.tax_benefits: No excise duties for electric vehicles.

tax_benefits: Exemption from registration charges and vignettes for BEVs and FCEVs.
Incentive scheme: €9,200 for BEVs, €4,600 for PHEVs.

Denmark.tax_benefits: Exemption for FCEVs until the end of 2021.
purchase_incentives: BEVs and PHEVs pay reduced registration tax (20% in 2020, increasing in subsequent years).
Temporary deduction in taxable personal income for private users.

Estonia.tax_benefits: Bonus of €5,000 for the purchase of a full-electric car or van <€50,000.

Finland.purchase_incentives: Incentive of €2,000 for households to purchase or lease a new BEV ≤€50,000 (until 2021).

France.tax_benefits: Regions provide exemptions for alternatively-powered vehicles.

tax_benefits: 50% reduction for HEV and PHEV cars.
Exemption for trucks with electric motors.

Hungary.tax_benefits: 10-year exemption for BEVs and FCEVs registered until 2020.
purchase_incentives: Exemption from CO2-based tax for vehicles emitting <20g CO2/km.
Incentives for purchasing BEVs and PHEVs.

tax_benefits: Reduction for BEVs up to €5,000; PHEVs up to €2,500; HEVs up to €1,500.
Minimum rate (€120 per year) for BEVs.
Reduced rate (€170 per year) for PHEVs ≤60g CO2/km.
Ireland.purchase_incentives: 'Benefit-in-kind concession' for electric cars and vans <€50,000.

Italy.tax_benefits: Five-year exemption for electric vehicles from first registration.
Italy.purchase_incentives: 75% reduction of the tax rate for equivalent petrol vehicles after five years.

Latvia.tax_benefits: Exemption for electric vehicles; Minimum rate (€10) for BEVs.
Latvia.purchase_incentives: Exemption for cars emitting ≤50g CO2/km registered after 31 December 2009.

Luxembourg.tax_benefits: Minimum rate for vehicles emitting ≤90g CO2/km.
purchase_incentives: Up to €5,000 for BEVs and PHEVs ≤50g CO2/km.

Malta.tax_benefits: Minimum rate for vehicles emitting <100g CO2/km.

purchase_incentives: Subsidy scheme (SEPP) for buying or leasing new or used BEV.

Poland.tax_benefits: Exemption for BEVs and PHEVs ≤2,000cc until the end of 2020.

Portugal.tax_benefits: VAT deduction for BEVs <€62,000 and PHEVs <€50,000.

Slovakia.tax_benefits: BEVs or PHEVs combined with other fuel types are depreciated for two years.

Slovenia.tax_benefits: Minimum rate (0.5%) for vehicles emitting <110g CO2/km.

Spain.tax_benefits: Exemption from special tax for vehicles emitting ≤120g CO2/km.
purchase_incentives: Up to €10,000 for purchasing a new BEV, €4,250 for new PHEVs ≤50g CO2/km.

tax_benefits: Reduced annual road tax for zero-emission vehicles.
purchase_incentives: Government grants for zero-emission cars up to £3,000 if price is <£50,000.
